_description: William Dunbar, verses addressed to the King — seven 5-line stanzas including refrain, ‘My panefull purs so priclis me’

Banna.First Lines:
Sanct saluatour send siluer sorrowIt grevis me both evin and
                    morrow…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Can best remeid for this maliceThat with sic panis prickillis
                    me
